item.title: Top 14 Health Benefits of Black Cardamom
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Cardamom is referred to as the “queen of spices” for good reason. Let us introduce you to this other larger kind of cardamoms if you haven’t already. Black cardamom pods are usually larger, with larger seeds and thicker wrinkly skin on the outside, but green cardamom pods are little with thin readily peelable skin! item.title: 21 Major Health And Beauty Benefits of Bay Leaves
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Bay leaves are the leaves known for their medicinal properties. They protect our body against oxidative stress and provide benefits like managing diabetes, improving cardiovascular health, reducing inflammation, reducing respiratory problems, and optimizing digestion. What are Bay Leaves? Many types of plant leaves are referred to as  “bay leaves”, but the true bay leaf is… Read More »21 Major Health And Beauty Benefits of Bay Leaves

item.title: 25 Amazing Health And Beauty Benefits of White Pepper
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Both white pepper and black pepper are flowers of the same shrub and differ from each other in terms of taste, color, aroma, processing technique, and benefits. They are native to South India, and are known by various names such as “safed mirch” in Hindi, ‘Tella miriyalu’ in Telugu, ‘Velai melaku’ in Tamil, ‘Bili menasu’… Read More »25 Amazing Health And Beauty Benefits of White Pepper

item.title: 20 Amazing Health And Beauty Benefits of Black Pepper
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Black pepper (Piper nigrum) is a flowering vine cultivated for the fruit of the same name and is known for its unique taste and aroma. It is loaded with essential nutrients that provide several health and beauty benefits.  Dried pepper is also known as peppercorn and is available in three varieties black, green and white.… Read More »20 Amazing Health And Beauty Benefits of Black Pepper

item.title: 22 Major Health Benefits of Allspice
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Allspice is a megaspice which can be used as an alternative to cinnamon, nutmeg, pepper and other spices. It is derived from the dried berries of the evergreen shrub, “Pimenta dioica”. Its unique flavor is a combination of cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, pepper, juniper, and ginger. It was first cultivated in Southern Mexico, and Central America,… Read More »22 Major Health Benefits of Allspice
